--- select_literals_paren.sql
SELECT (1)

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*ast.Hint)(nil),
  With:  (*ast.With)(nil),
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Select:   0,
    Distinct: false,
    As:       nil,
    Results:  []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.ParenExpr{
          Lparen: 7,
          Rparen: 9,
          Expr:   &ast.IntLiteral{
            ValuePos: 8,
            ValueEnd: 9,
            Base:     10,
            Value:    "1",
          },
        },
      },
    },
    From:    (*ast.From)(nil),
    Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*ast.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT (1)
